DOC.brief_summary: Patient's anxiety prior to surgery has been linked to more harmful outcome after surgery. The investigators aim to evaluate the effect of video information on preoperative anxiety level in patients with colorectal cancer.
DOC.brief_title: Effects of Video Information on Preoperative Anxiety in Patients With Colorectal Cancer
DOC.criteria: Age: 2075 Elective surgery History of previous any surgery emergency surgery dementia psychological disease
